(STEPHEN LAM/Reuters) Facebook pushes mobile shopping features in move to e-commerce SAN FRANCISCO — Reuters 
Monday, Oct. 12, 2015 2:38PM EDT 
Last updated Monday, Oct. 12, 2015 2:40PM EDT 
Facebook Inc wants its users to shop for clothes and other products from their mobile phones without ever leaving its app. 
In an effort to move further into e-commerce and compete with Amazon Inc’s retail offerings, Facebook announced Monday it is testing several ad features that allow users to shop directly through its app. connect with us The Globe and Mail Newspaper
